When a man who is counted worthy to fill a position of trust in one of our institutions or in a mission, 
                                                                           366
betrays his trust and gives himself into the hands of Satan as an instrument of unrighteousness, to sow the seeds of evil, he is a traitor of the worst type. From one such tainted, polluted mind the youth often receive the impure thoughts that lead to a life of shame and defilement.
